textos_fuente.text: 511 Bar & Lounge Opens in Flagler Village | Lifestyle Media Group SOUTH FLORIDA BUSINESS & WEALTH MAGAZINE Digital Magazine Skip to content Main Navigation Lifestyle Media Group Search for: Sections Arts & Culture Ask the Experts Community and Philanthropy Editorâ€™s Choice Cover Stories Editorâ€™s Choice Local Business Good Press Industries Industries Community & Philanthropy Fashion and Retail Fashion and Retail Health Care & Wellness Hospitality Real Estate Retail Travel & Recreation Food & Drink Featured Restaurants Food & Drink Nightlife People Profiles A&E Spotlight People Profiles Local Buzz Around Town Local Buzz Things To Do Web Extras About Lifestyle Media Advertise With Us Contact Us Digital Publications Meet The Team Subscribe Social Media Connect Our Other Brands South Florida's largest single-title brand Subscribe Header Navigation Editorâ€™s Choice Cover Stories Industries Travel & Recreation Real Estate Community and Philanthropy Arts & Culture Fashion and Retail Health Care & Wellness Good Press Food & Drink Featured Restaurants People Profiles A&E Spotlight Events Local Buzz Things To Do Ask the Experts About Us Contact Us Meet The Team Advertise With Us Food & Drink 511 Bar & Lounge Opens in Flagler Village The venue features innovative spirits, live music, food trucks and themed programming. July 12, 2024 | Lifestyle Staff 511 Bar & Lounge is the newest hotspot in Fort Lauderdaleâ€™s trendy Flagler Village, catering to whiskey aficionados and cocktail lovers. Since its discreet launch this past Spring, it has quickly become a favorite among locals. It boasts a stylish industrial interior and a chic backyard patio with lawn games, twinkling lights, and plenty of seating under umbrellas. â€œWe have all been a part of the Fort Lauderdale bar and hospitality scene for over 30 years, collectively, so when we decided to open 511 Bar & Lounge together, it was truly more of a passion project than anything else,â€ says co-owner Digby Nothard. â€œIt was important for us to create a space that reflects and compliments the Flagler Village community with great quality cocktails, each made with a two-ounce pour of love, lots of local brands and brews, and a welcoming atmosphere where guests can kick back with friends, their dogs and just enjoy.â€ Crafted by co-owner Trent Oâ€™Connor, renowned from Marylandâ€™s historic â€œThe Horse You Came In on Saloonâ€ and Fort Lauderdaleâ€™s â€œWhiskey Neat,â€ the cocktail menu embodies his affection for Fort Lauderdale, offering a mix of classic and inventive concoctions. Notable selections include the Mimi, featuring Don Julio Blanco, fresh mango, lime, muddled jalapeno, and a Tajin rim; Pretty in Pink, composed of Partida Reposado Tequila, Aperol, freshly squeezed grapefruit and lime juice, finished with Q Mixers club soda; KB Special: made with Espolon Reposado Tequila, Orange Liqueur, agave, freshly squeezed lime and orange juice, cream of coconut, and orange zest; and a variety of freshly prepared Margaritas, available with flavor enhancements such as mango, peach, prickly pear, passion fruit, strawberry or watermelon. The bar also offers the Crush Cocktail, a Baltimore favorite made with the fresh juice of a whole orange or lemon. Guests can choose between the traditional Orange Crush, made with Deep Eddyâ€™s Orange Vodka and freshly squeezed orange juice over crushed ice, topped with Sprite, or the Peach Lemonade Crush, featuring Bulleit Bourbon, peach nectar, freshly squeezed lemon juice over crushed ice, topped with Sprite. The 1,500-square-foot space features artwork by local artists, including a striking pixelated Everglades landscape by Peter Nolan that serves as the barâ€™s focal point. The indoor bar seamlessly transitions into a 2,500-square-foot outdoor patio, accommodating up to 30 people. Here, guests can indulge in delectable offerings from a rotating selection of food trucks such as BMC Smash Burger, La Condensa Tacos, Mambas Pizza, Duck Fat Dogs, Mr. Meatball, Bohemian Grill, Carloâ€™s and Pepeâ€™s, and more. This diverse array of tempting street food perfectly complements the beverages served at 511. During happy hour, which runs every Wednesday through Friday from 4 p.m. to 7 p.m., patrons can enjoy special deals such as $6 Premium Well Liquor, $7 Fresh Margaritas, $8 Orange, Ruby Red Grapefruit and John Daly Crushes, along with discounted beer and wine by the glass. Additionally, live music takes the spotlight every Friday, Saturday and Sunday, with local bands and DJs performing a variety of genres, including classic rock, blues, 80â€™s classic rock, soul and electronic music. â€œWe strongly believe that live music and entertainment is the heartbeat of Fort Lauderdaleâ€™s vibrant nightlife,â€ Oâ€™Connor says. â€œIt brings our community together, creating unforgettable moments and an electrifying atmosphere that reflects the spirit of our city. This is why we are committed to showcasing incredible local talent and providing a stage where local artists can shine.â€ 511 Bar & Lounge not only features an outdoor patio but also boasts a 13,000 sqft event space behind the restaurant for hosting large-scale events. This space will host recurring monthly themed events such as Jazz & Blues Nights, Country Nights, and more. These events will feature themed food truck vendors, sponsors, and live music talent. For more information follow along on social media via @511bar . Michelle Wines Veuve Clicquot Yellow Label Clos du Temple Wines Coravin Pivot Accessories Gifts Top 50 Guide Gift Sets Gift Cards Custom Engraving FEATURED Brugal 1888 Rum Corporate Concierge Gifting Waterford Glassware Smoking Kit Barware Sugarfina Candy Accessories Glassware Mixers & Bitters Barware Candy Cocktail Kits FEATURED Altos Tequila Cocktail Kit Kit Cutwater Canned Cocktails RTD POPULAR SEARCHES Wyoming Whiskey Hispanic Heritage Month Collection Truthteller 1839 House Of Dewars TRENDING Hispanic Heritage Month Rabbit Hole Cavehill Cascade Moon About Us In 2013, our founders wanted to send several bottles of premium vodka to a college friend who lived across the country. They quickly realized that there was no website devoted to doing just that. Today, ReserveBar has evolved to become the established e-commerce leader in rare, luxury, and ultra-premium spirits for all occasions. We specialize in discovery, customization, and convenient access to the worldâ€™s finest spirits, champagnes, and wines for self-consumption, collecting, innovative gifting, and provisioning an outstanding bar. In addition to our seamless consumer-facing experience, ReserveBar is a technology platform at its core, leveraging cutting-edge software, data, analytics, and distribution advancement. Offering new and limited-edition products, ReserveBar is a destination for todayâ€™s modern, convenience-driven and elevated shopper, delivering the most curated offerings to homes across the United States. What we stand for Our Core Values Innovation We invest in the future of our platforms, partners,  people, and products. Expertise We continuously perfect and maintain our industry-leading knowledge. Collaboration We embrace inclusivity, and are dedicated to our community  and partnerships. Service Our commitment toour customers and partners sets the bar within the industry. In the Spirit Of Change Spirited Change initiative The Spirits Industry has historically been devoid of significant ownership and representation of diverse communities. Black, brown, female, and LGBTQ+  entrepreneurs have not successfully penetrated the multi-billion dollar wine, spirits, and craft beer industries. In fact, less than 5% of brands are owned by BIPOC and/or women entrepreneurs. Out of this dilemma, Spirited Change was born! We have partnered with brands and companies big and small to make measurable change in support of diverse communities. We invite you to share in this support by exploring this collection of spirits and wine! About Us â€“ Eleven Hospitality Group Skip to content Menu Close Back Suite of Services About Us Our Brands Our Story Our Team Our Locations In the News Gallery Contact Login Facebook Instagram Twitter Email Close 0 products in your cart 0 Total: $0.00 Shipping & taxes calculated at checkout View Cart Update cart Checkout Continue browsing Our Brands Eleven Hospitality Group operates a collection of award-winning hospitality concepts throughout the United States. Rooted in delivering greatness and intentional in creating memorable experiences, we endeavor for our concepts to bring joy, delight and a unique culinary event every time. We invite you to meet our brands below: Our Story We are rooted in family and our origins are about making memories. Chef and CEO, Cory Harwell, grew up in Woodstock, GA,Â where he learned to cook by the age of 10 under the watchful eye of his mom and grandmother.Â With this spirit, Eleven Hospitality Group was created to share the sentiment of "family and celebration.â€ We draw inspiration from the best memories of our lives and share them with our guests, our team members, our vendors and our communities. Our Values Our entire EHG team is trustworthy, genuine and self-aware - recognizing when we succeed when we fail and what we can do better. âœ¦ Respect âœ¦ Boldness âœ¦ Authenticity âœ¦ Greatness We endeavor to extend this to our guests, our vendors, our communities, as well as to our team. Our Verticals âœ¦  High-end Restaurants âœ¦  Casual-style Restaurants âœ¦  Breakfast-style Restaurants âœ¦  Artisanal Market âœ¦  Chef-driven Catering âœ¦  Commissary Kitchen âœ¦  Nightlife Lounge âœ¦  Attraction/Event Spaces Suite of Services With more than 30 years of immersive experience creating, debuting, managing and scaling award-winning restaurant and hospitality concepts, Eleven Hospitality Group knows how to build the roadmap, the tool kit and engage in best practices â€“ and we want to share it. We proudly partner with emerging and established restaurant groups for 360-degree culinary support for you to go live and thrive. Learn more about our suite of essential services to take your concept from a seed of an idea to an IRL (in real life) experience. SUITES LISTED BELOW. Our Team Respect. Boldness. Engagement. Empowerment. Authenticity. Opinions. Love. Our entire Eleven Hospitality Group team believes in being great. We are rooted in our belief that we can change how you eat â€“ and we love that. Heart, knowledge and intention go into each and every dish and itâ€™s the team behind our concepts that is bringing this to you - daily. Meet our team of culinary change agents and food lovers Cory Harwell President David English VP, Director of Project Development Andrew Weintraub VP, Restaurants Cyndi Arons Director of Finance Rachel Tate Director of Operations CONTACT OUR TEAM Kind Words from Our Guests "Could not have asked for better execution. My wife and I will forever cherish the memory of our wedding day and could not be more grateful to the Carson Kitchen team for hosting us." Arjun C. | June 2022 Carson Kitchen Las Vegas "Insanity. We had the bacon jam, killer shrimp, devils eggs, & crispy chicken skins for the appetizer. Unreal! Word needs to be spread, this is the best food in the state no questions asked." Matt C. | May 2022 Carson Kitchen Salt Lake City "Service was phenomenal!! Our server was attentive and helpful and knowledgeable on each dish. It was plenty of food to share between 2-3 people easily." Mhaliene M. | May 2022 Carson Kitchen Atlanta "Highly recommend taking the short walk from city center to dine at this truly well-thought-out, professionally run, unpretentious yet subtly classy restaurant. We put it right up there as one of our top dining experiences (and we travel and dine a lot)." Dana C. | April 2022 Carson Kitchen Salt Lake City "This place has always been one of my favorite places and is probably my number one spot in downtown. Great atmosphere with great food. The staff is always so friendly too!" 511Â Bar & Lounge Offers a Fun and Friendly Environment | Lifestyle Media Group SOUTH FLORIDA BUSINESS & WEALTH MAGAZINE Digital Magazine Skip to content Main Navigation Lifestyle Media Group Search for: Sections Arts & Culture Ask the Experts Community and Philanthropy Editorâ€™s Choice Cover Stories Editorâ€™s Choice Local Business Good Press Industries Industries Community & Philanthropy Fashion and Retail Fashion and Retail Health Care & Wellness Hospitality Real Estate Retail Travel & Recreation Food & Drink Featured Restaurants Food & Drink Nightlife People Profiles A&E Spotlight People Profiles Local Buzz Around Town Local Buzz Things To Do Web Extras About Lifestyle Media Advertise With Us Contact Us Digital Publications Meet The Team Subscribe Social Media Connect Our Other Brands South Florida's largest single-title brand Subscribe Header Navigation Editorâ€™s Choice Cover Stories Industries Travel & Recreation Real Estate Community and Philanthropy Arts & Culture Fashion and Retail Health Care & Wellness Good Press Food & Drink Featured Restaurants People Profiles A&E Spotlight Events Local Buzz Things To Do Ask the Experts About Us Contact Us Meet The Team Advertise With Us Food & Drink 511Â Bar & Lounge Offers a Fun and Friendly Environment August 23, 2024 | Aurora Dominguez Have you ever stepped into a spot where you simply feel right at home, a place where you immediately are comfortable enough to make new friends? 511Â Bar & Lounge is exactly that type of place. It is located at Lauderdaleâ€™s hip Flagler Village , a place where creatives connect and new spots with unique environments and experiences have been popping up all around. While 511 Bar & Lounge is a place where you can kick back and relax, it also mixes in a touch of elegance with handcrafted cocktails, alongside top spirits. Those who enjoy top-notch whiskies, a chill and homey vibe, as well as fun adventures will love this new place thatâ€™s already making waves in the area. Also, the elegant bar is inviting, one where laughter mixes in with different conversations, a perfect place to connect and sample spirits and drinks suggested by the 511 Bar & Lounge owners and staff. 511 Bar & Lounge is not only a place where you can bring your pets, relax on a soft chair inside the spot, or even kick back on the outdoor patio. You can also pair your drinks with food from food trucks that visit the lounge daily and offer all sorts of culinary treats, like the Italian bites that we indulged on during our visit. When we visited for the first trivia night and to take in the environment, we were wowed by the food truck that offered creative Italian offerings. The food truck, known as I Love Panzerotti, doesnâ€™t onlyserve pizzasand oven-baked or fried calzones, so you can have it your way, but it also offers yummy dishes such as dessert pizzas and pressed paninis. And, if you want to add a little something refreshing to the mix during trivia night, their seltzer buckets with Highnoon, Surfside or Nutrl are 5 for $25. Our visit was also a treat thanks to a competitive and engaging Trivia Nigh hosted by Geeks Who Drink. The questions were part of the nightâ€™s conversations, and you could sense that everyone was enjoying the entertainment and how the lounge mixes in elegance and fun. Feeling like a little happy hour is in order? Then you are in luck, because the lounge offers happy hour from 4 to 7 pm where you can enjoy $6 Premium well liquor, $7 fresh margaritas, and $8 beverages such as the unique and refreshing Orange and Ruby Red Grapefruit crushes. While 511Â Bar & Lounge is casual, thereâ€™s nothing casual about how seriously they take their cocktail menu and how they handcraft these cocktails with true passion. From a perfectly balanced old-fashioned to flavorful martinis and everything in between, this is a place where lovers of true and creative mixology will find themselves like theyâ€™re right at home. The spot will be offering other forms of entertainment in the future, such as jazz nights and even more trivia. We recommend setting aside some time to visit this warm and inviting place with friends, and we promise you that you will enjoy an unforgettable and relaxed time as you take in the loungeâ€™s positive energy. ItÂ will introduce its Booze, Blues, BBQ & Booze event on Saturday, Aug. 24 . The monthly Jazz and Blues party will occur once a month at the lounge and promises an immersive and fun experience for those who love a little soothing music and fun vibes with a side of good BBQ. For more information on 511Â Bar & Lounge, call 954-401-0450. And follow their social media @511bar for event information and new announcements.
